item.title: PostgreSQL tips
item.description: List users \du \du+ Add user postgres=# create role won; CREATE ROLE postgres=# \du won List of roles Role name | Attributes | Member of -----------+--------------+----------- won | Cannot login | {} alter role won LOGIN password 'won'; Use database \c fabricexplorer List databases \l \l+
